virtual-sensor.name: Thur_DozerRssi_mapped_1396
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerRssiMsg) from Thur deployment in usable form

address.predicate: select TIMESTAMP, GENERATIONTIME, POSITION, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, PAYLOAD_RSSI_ID0, PAYLOAD_RSSI_RSSI0 from Thur_DozerRssi_muxed_mapped_1396 where PAYLOAD_RSSI_RSSI0 != -1

source.query: select TIMESTAMP, GENERATIONTIME, POSITION, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, PAYLOAD_RSSI_ID0 as RSSI_NODEID, PAYLOAD_RSSI_RSSI0 as RSSI from wrapper
